InstructionData.Title: PCS-AV2-HP-PID - Pressure Control System 2xAV + Hazard + PID
InstructionData.Author: onebit
InstructionData.Instructions:
# PCS-AV2-HP-PID - Pressure Control System 2xAV + Hazard + PID # https://github.com/dtandersen/stationeers-library alias GasSensor d0 alias VentIn d1 alias VentOut d2 alias Hazard d3
define SETPOINT 101.325 define DIFF 1 define OVERSHOOT 0.5 define TOXIC 0.5 #kpa define KpIn 20 define KpOut 2
alias sp r1 alias error r2 alias bias r3 alias pv r4 alias ventinact r5 alias ventoutact r6 alias output r7 alias kp r8 alias hazard r10 alias temp1 r13 alias temp2 r14
s VentIn Lock 0 s VentIn Mode 1 s VentOut Lock 0 s VentOut Mode 1 move sp SETPOINT sub ventinact SETPOINT DIFF add ventoutact SETPOINT DIFF
ok: s VentIn On 0 s VentOut On 0 l pv GasSensor Pressure move kp 1 move bias sp jal calcpid #s db Setting ventoutact blt pv ventinact lowpressure bgt pv ventoutact highpressure jal checkhazard yield j ok
lowpressure: l pv GasSensor Pressure bgt pv sp ok move kp KpIn add bias sp OVERSHOOT jal calcpid s VentIn On 1 s VentIn PressureExternal 0 s VentIn PressureInternal output jal checkhazard yield j lowpressure
highpressure: l pv GasSensor Pressure blt pv sp ok move kp KpOut sub bias sp OVERSHOOT jal calcpid #s db Setting output s VentOut On 1 s VentOut PressureExternal output s VentOut PressureInternal 40000 jal checkhazard yield j highpressure
calcpid: sub error sp pv mul error kp error s db Setting error add output bias error j ra
checkhazard: l temp1 GasSensor RatioVolatiles l temp2 GasSensor RatioPollutant add temp1 temp1 temp2 # volatiles + pollutant mul temp1 temp1 pv # toxins * pressure sge hazard temp1 TOXIC beqz hazard safe s Hazard On 1 safe: j ra
